root.title: Suspicious Network Communication With IPFS
root.description: Detects connections to interplanetary file system (IPFS) containing a user's email address which mirrors behaviours observed in recent phishing campaigns leveraging IPFS to host credential harvesting webpages.
root.author: Gavin Knapp

falsepositives.item: Legitimate use of IPFS being used in the organisation. However the cs-uri regex looking for a user email will likely negate this.
